assignments.name: Assign_Fee_Charge_for_Savings_Transaction
assignments.label: Assign Fee Charge for Savings Transaction

recordCreates.name: Create_Interest_Charge_Transaction_Line_Records
recordCreates.label: Create Interest Charge Transaction Line Records

fields.name: Wating
fields.fieldText: This Account Timelocked United {!Savings_Record.Timelock_Expiry__c} withdrawals are not permitted

fields.name: Fee_Amount
fields.fieldText: How much is the transaction for fee?

validationRule.errorMessage: Transaction date should be greater than or equal to {!lasttransactiondate}

fields.name: Warn_interest
fields.fieldText: There is no deposit amount. Please deposit something to do interest charge.

fields.name: ReversalConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
Are you sure you want to reverse this transaction?

Type : {!get_savings_tline.Type__c}

Transaction Date : {!get_savings_transaction.Transaction_Date__c}

Amount : {!get_savings_tline.Amount__c}

Description : {!get_savings_tline.Description__c}

validationRule.errorMessage: Transaction date must be greater than or equal to reversing date {!reversalValidationDate}

fields.name: warn_msg_reversal
fields.fieldText: There is no transaction is available for reversal

fields.name: Amounts
fields.fieldText: How much is the transaction for?

validationRule.errorMessage: Amount should be greater than zero
